title: LTB Graded T205 Ty Cobb Sgc/Psa 3-5 range.
author: Jstottlemire1

posts.post_title: LTB Graded T205 Ty Cobb Sgc/Psa 3-5 range.
posts.post_content: [url]Stottlemire800@gmail.com[/url] with asking price and pics or shoot me a pm.   Thank you kindly.

One of my top 2 cards which I can ever afford to own in the hobby. And aesthetically it might be might favorite card in the hobby.  If I ever upgrade my 6 it will be for sale. I wouldn't hold your breadth though. Good luck. They are beautiful.

.

Thanks Leon.  I was late to the party on your last two
Cobbs; Sporting Life Psa 5 and the 1916 Sporting News.   Thanks for keeping me in mind sir.
